tree.name: Ayo Dosunmu
tree.tradeDescription: Trade deadline deal: Timberwolves acquired Ayo Dosunmu and Julian Phillips from Bulls for Rob Dillingham, Leonard Miller, and 4 second-round picks

assetsGivenUp.name: Rob Dillingham
assetsGivenUp.note: Kentucky guard, selected #8 by SAS, traded to MIN for 2031 unprotected 1st + 2030 pick swap

assetsGivenUp.name: 2031 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: MIN 2031 unprotected 1st round pick, sent to SAS

assetsGivenUp.name: 2030 1st Round Pick Swap
assetsGivenUp.note: Right for SAS to swap 1st round picks with MIN in 2030

assetsGivenUp.name: Leonard Miller
assetsGivenUp.note: Canadian forward, selected #33 by SAS, traded to MIN on draft night

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick (via UTA)
assetsGivenUp.note: Utah's 2026 2nd round pick, acquired by MIN in Conley 3-team trade, sent to SAS for Miller

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 2nd Round Pick (MIN own)
assetsGivenUp.note: Minnesota's own 2028 2nd round pick, sent to SAS for Miller

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Least favorable of Denver or Golden State 2nd round picks

assetsGivenUp.name: 2031 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Most favorable of Minnesota or Golden State 2nd round picks

assetsGivenUp.name: 2032 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Most favorable of Phoenix or Houston 2nd round picks
